title: AI startup DualEntry raises $90 million to deepen ERP market push
description: (Reuters) -Artificial intelligence (AI) startup DualEntry has raised $90 million in a Series A round led by Lightspeed Venture Partners and Khosla Ventures to take on established enterprise resource planning (ERP) software providers, the company said.

title: AI use in schools growing 'pretty rapidly' as policies lag: RAND report
description: More teachers and students are using artificial intelligence, but district policies on AI are lagging, according to a RAND report.
content:

title: OpenAI asks court to dismiss trade-secret lawsuit from Musk's xAI
description: OpenAI asked a federal judge on Thursday to dismiss a lawsuit alleging it lured employees away from Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI to steal its trade secrets, calling the case part of Musk's "ongoing harassment" of the company.
content: Oct 2 (Reuters) - OpenAI asked a federal judge on Thursday to dismiss a lawsuit alleging it lured employees away from Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI to steal its trade secrets, calling the case part of Musk's "ongoing harassment" of ... [1893 chars]

title: U.S. Stock Futures Steady as Market Brushes Off Government Shutdown Worries
description: U.S. stock futures were largely flat on Thursday evening after a positive session. Strength in the artificial intelligence (AI) sector seemed to...
content: U.S. stock futures were largely flat on Thursday evening after a positive session. Strength in the artificial intelligence (AI) sector seemed to outweigh worries about the two-day-old U.S. government shutdown. Futures on the Nasdaq 100 (NDX), the Dow... [988 chars]

title: OpenAI Tops SpaceX as World’s Most Valuable Private Company With $500 Billion Valuation
description: Employee share sale pushes OpenAI to a $500 billion valuation as investor frenzy in artificial intelligence continues to grow.
content:
OpenAI has overtaken SpaceX to become the world’s most valuable private company after a $6.6 billion employee share sale at a $500 billion valuation—the milestone underscoring the investor frenzy fueling the artificial-intelligence boom.
According to... [1795 chars]

title: Al Roker Says AI is Too Similar to His Name: 'It should be A.I. or A-I'
description: Al Roker exclusively shares with Us Weekly his funny concerns about the shorthand spelling of artificial intelligence being too similar to his name
content:

title: Tech firm Perplexity AI’s Comet browser now is free
description: Officials for San Francisco-based Perplexity AI on Thursday announced the tech startup's Comet browser that is powered by artificial intelligence is free.
content:
Oct. 2 (UPI) -- Officials for San Francisco-based Perplexity AI on Thursday announced the tech startup's Comet browser that is powered by artificial intelligence is free to download and available globally.

title: EPA Moves to Prioritize Review of New Chemicals for Data Centers
description: The agency’s administrator, Lee Zeldin, says he wants to “get out of the way” and stop “gumming up the works” so that fast-track construction of the massive computing facilities will “make America the artificial intelligence capital of the world.”
content:
The Trump administration has begun prioritizing the review of new, potentially hazardous chemicals used in data centers that public health advocates and environmental attorneys warn could endanger workers, communities and the environment.
